input_text:
Job Title: LICENSED LANDSCAPE ARCHITECT

Location: Cache County, UT

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Civil Solutions Group (CSG) is a multi-disciplinary firm located in Providence, UT with other locations in Utah and Idaho. Disciplines include civil, structural, and geotechnical engineering; surveying; environmental services; and landscape architecture. The following principles guide our design services:
Planning Healthy CommunitiesDesigning and Engineering Sustainable SitesCreating Attractive and Resilient Landscapes
CSG works to contribute to society and to create spaces that endure and stand the test of time. Work consists of a wide variety of both private and public sector projects. Some of the specific work types include commercial, higher education, K-12, multi-family housing, parks and sports fields, and residential. More information can be found at www.civilsolutionsgroup.net.
Job Description:CSGâ€™s Landscape Architecture Department is seeking one qualified and experienced landscape architect to join our team as soon as possible.
Responsibilities Include:Plan production & drafting (from conceptual design to final construction documents)Rendering and creating presentation documentsManaging all project tasks and working with clients as neededSupporting Landscape Department Manager in delegated tasks such as marketing, proposal writing, training, and mentoring Jr. Staff
Requirements:CSG is looking for a candidate who has been licensed as a landscape architect in one or more states for 2 or more years (preferably Utah). We are seeking a self-motivated, dependable individual who is willing to work hard to rise to new challenges and a good team player who will fit well into our interdisciplinary collaborative office. The individual shall have good verbal and written communication abilities and basic office skills.It is strongly preferred that the applicant is proficient in AutoCAD, Land F/X, Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Experience in all project tasks pertaining to commercial and residential landscape architecture will be beneficial, including irrigation design, landscape design, grading, site planning, creating construction documents, etc.How to Apply:Email a resume (may include a cover letter and references) and portfolio or work samples detailing your skills and your relevant work experience to info@civilsolutionsgroup.net. This position is a benefitted full-time position with compensation depending on experience. It will be filled as soon as the right candidate is found.

Experience Level (if available): None
